    jumeg.connectivity.plot_labelled_group_connectivity_circle¶

    jumeg.connectivity.plot_labelled_group_connectivity_circle(cortex_grouping, con, orig_labels, node_order_size=68, out_fname='circle.png', title=None, facecolor='white', fontsize_names=6, subplot=111, include_legend=False, n_lines=None, fig=None, show=True)¶

    Plot labelled group connectivity circle.

    Plot the connectivity circle grouped and ordered according to groups in the yaml input file provided.
